name: protean
effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.
short_effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.
